Reference

High level functions

ms_linechart() ms_barchart() ms_areachart() ms_scatterchart()

ms_chart object

Global settings

chart_settings()

set chart options

as_bar_stack()

set a barchart as a stacked barchart

Axis

chart_ax_x() chart_ax_y()

axis settings

Chart titles

chart_labels()

Modify axis and plot labels

Series visual settings

chart_data_fill()

Modify fill colour

chart_data_labels()

Modify data labels settings

chart_data_line_width()

Modify line width

chart_data_size()

Modify symbol size

chart_data_smooth()

Smooth series

chart_data_stroke()

Modify marker stroke colour

chart_data_symbol()

Modify symbol

chart_labels_text()

Modify labels font settings

Global visual settings

set_theme() mschart_theme() chart_theme()

set chart theme

Send to Microsoft Documents

ph_with(<ms_chart>)

add a MS Chart output into a PowerPoint object

body_add_chart()

add chart into a Word document
